question: Who was the Governor General of British India when the Indian National Congress (INC) was founded in 1885?
explanation: Lord Dufferin was the Governor General and Viceroy of British India when the Indian National Congress (INC) was founded in 1885. It was founded by Allan Octavian Hume to create a platform which was under the supervision of the British and which should let the British government know the demands of the Indian people.
